title: 80 stocks on my buy list
itunes:title: 80 stocks on my buy list
description: We start today’s show by discussing hedge fund titan David Tepper’s recent call for a market bottom… Tepper’s known for making macro calls that turn out to be correct—is he right about the bottom? We also highlight a few diamonds in the rough amid the market selloff… And I share 80 stocks trading at absurdly cheap valuations. Finally, we explain why the Bitcoin selloff is healthy… and why the end of SPACs is great for individual investors.  In this episode:  David Tepper’s huge market call [1:15]  Solid companies to watch in this selloff [8:25]  80 stocks trading at cheap valuations [13:50]  Will Bitcoin hold the $30,000 level? [18:50] Why Bitcoin isn’t going anywhere [25:50] Why SPACs fell apart [28:24]   Enjoyed this episode?
